page.title: 14COMMUNICATIONS KING'SNYMPTON
page.content: {TELECOMMUNICATIONS } There is one public telephone in this area situated in the Village Green at King's Nympton. Most properties have private telephones. {THE POST OFFICE}A postal delivery is made by van from Umberleigh on weekdays. The mail is brought to the local Post Office at 7.30 a.m. where it is sorted into three rounds.{ROUND {1}THE IMMEDIATE VILLAGE{ROUND 2}WEST PARK, BEARA, SMYTHA HUMMACOTT, STAPLETON, LEIGH VIEW, KINGSTREE and farms North of them.{ROUND 3}Farms North-West of the village but not in this selected area. GREAT LIGHTLEIGH, WADDINGTON, BLAKES, SPITTLE, COOMBE, CUTLAND, BUNSON CADBURY,GARLAND,BYCOTT are in{Chulm-leigh postal area.}Wooda is served by the van from{Umberleigh. Collections are made from the Post Office at 7.30a.m. and 4.00 p.m.
